archimate:Driver.name: Use Good Technology
archimate:Driver.documentation: Making sure that the tools being used are of some benefit to the whole company, encourage participation in IT decisions, become a solution for business continuity, can be re-used, are compliant, protect the company's IP, gives data integrity, increases accessibility, delivers safe retention and effective disposal of data, provides good warranty and utility, doesn't promote costly technical diversification and proliferation, and is interoperable with other ecosystem components.
